div.p: Our consul has not yet returned from the assembly; nothing is known here about the letters sent by yours. Perhaps we will have everything from the assembly. I sent your letters written to me to Mr. Steiger, the Bernese consul, imploring him to assist the struggling cause.
Gallicium, the poor chicken. When that Lambert returns, then do what you can; for I received yours written on the 15th of this month. 21st February 1566.
